00075 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00076 //defines
00077 
00078 /*
00079  *  Define the SHA1 circular left shift macro
00080  */
00081 #define SHA1CircularShift(bits,word) \
00082                 (((word) << (bits)) | ((word) >> (32-(bits))))
00083 
00084 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 //private member-functions
00086 
00105 void SHA1::SHA1PadMessage(SHA1_CTX *context)
00106 {
00107         /*
00108          *  Check to see if the current message block is too small to hold
00109          *  the initial padding bits and length.  If so, we will pad the
00110          *  block, process it, and then continue padding into a second
00111          *  block.
00112          */
00113         if (context->Message_Block_Index > 55)
00114         {
00115                 context->Message_Block[context->Message_Block_Index++] = 0x80;
00116                 while(context->Message_Block_Index < 64)
00117                 {
00118                         context->Message_Block[context->Message_Block_Index++] = 0;
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 SHA1ProcessMessageBlock(context);
00122 
00123                 while(context->Message_Block_Index < 56)
00124                 {
00125                         context->Message_Block[context->Message_Block_Index++] = 0;
00126                 }
00127         }
00128         else
00129         {
00130                 context->Message_Block[context->Message_Block_Index++] = 0x80;
00131                 while(context->Message_Block_Index < 56)
00132                 {
00133                         context->Message_Block[context->Message_Block_Index++] = 0;
00134                 }
00135         }
00136 
00137         /*
00138          *  Store the message length as the last 8 octets
00139          */
00140         context->Message_Block[56] = context->Length_High >> 24;
00141         context->Message_Block[57] = context->Length_High >> 16;
00142         context->Message_Block[58] = context->Length_High >> 8;
00143         context->Message_Block[59] = context->Length_High;
00144         context->Message_Block[60] = context->Length_Low >> 24;
00145         context->Message_Block[61] = context->Length_Low >> 16;
00146         context->Message_Block[62] = context->Length_Low >> 8;
00147         context->Message_Block[63] = context->Length_Low;
00148 
00149         SHA1ProcessMessageBlock(context);
00150 }
00151 
00162 void SHA1::SHA1ProcessMessageBlock(SHA1_CTX *context)
00163 {
00164         const hl_uint32 K[] =    {       /* Constants defined in SHA-1   */
00165                 0x5A827999,
00166                 0x6ED9EBA1,
00167                 0x8F1BBCDC,
00168                 0xCA62C1D6
00169         };
00170         int           t;                 /* Loop counter                */
00171         hl_uint32      temp;              /* Temporary word value        */
00172         hl_uint32      W[80];             /* Word sequence               */
00173         hl_uint32      A, B, C, D, E;     /* Word buffers                */
00174 
00175         /*
00176          *  Initialize the first 16 words in the array W
00177          */
00178         for(t = 0; t < 16; t++)
00179         {
00180                 W[t] = context->Message_Block[t * 4] << 24;
00181                 W[t] |= context->Message_Block[t * 4 + 1] << 16;
00182                 W[t] |= context->Message_Block[t * 4 + 2] << 8;
00183                 W[t] |= context->Message_Block[t * 4 + 3];
00184         }
00185 
00186         for(t = 16; t < 80; t++)
00187         {
00188                 W[t] = SHA1CircularShift(1,W[t-3] ^ W[t-8] ^ W[t-14] ^ W[t-16]);
00189         }
00190 
00191         A = context->Intermediate_Hash[0];
00192         B = context->Intermediate_Hash[1];
00193         C = context->Intermediate_Hash[2];
00194         D = context->Intermediate_Hash[3];
00195         E = context->Intermediate_Hash[4];
00196 
00197         for(t = 0; t < 20; t++)
00198         {
00199                 temp =  SHA1CircularShift(5,A) +
00200                         ((B & C) | ((~B) & D)) + E + W[t] + K[0];
00201                 E = D;
00202                 D = C;
00203                 C = SHA1CircularShift(30,B);
00204                 B = A;
00205                 A = temp;
00206         }
00207 
00208         for(t = 20; t < 40; t++)
00209         {
00210                 temp = SHA1CircularShift(5,A) + (B ^ C ^ D) + E + W[t] + K[1];
00211                 E = D;
00212                 D = C;
00213                 C = SHA1CircularShift(30,B);
00214                 B = A;
00215                 A = temp;
00216         }
00217 
00218         for(t = 40; t < 60; t++)
00219         {
00220                 temp = SHA1CircularShift(5,A) +
00221                         ((B & C) | (B & D) | (C & D)) + E + W[t] + K[2];
00222                 E = D;
00223                 D = C;
00224                 C = SHA1CircularShift(30,B);
00225                 B = A;
00226                 A = temp;
00227         }
00228 
00229         for(t = 60; t < 80; t++)
00230         {
00231                 temp = SHA1CircularShift(5,A) + (B ^ C ^ D) + E + W[t] + K[3];
00232                 E = D;
00233                 D = C;
00234                 C = SHA1CircularShift(30,B);
00235                 B = A;
00236                 A = temp;
00237         }
00238 
00239         context->Intermediate_Hash[0] += A;
00240         context->Intermediate_Hash[1] += B;
00241         context->Intermediate_Hash[2] += C;
00242         context->Intermediate_Hash[3] += D;
00243         context->Intermediate_Hash[4] += E;
00244 
00245         context->Message_Block_Index = 0;
00246 }

00248 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00249 //public member-functions
00250 
00257 int SHA1::SHA1Reset(SHA1_CTX *context)
00258 {
00259         if (!context)
00260         {
00261                 return shaNull;
00262         }
00263 
00264         context->Length_Low             = 0;
00265         context->Length_High            = 0;
00266         context->Message_Block_Index    = 0;
00267 
00268         context->Intermediate_Hash[0]   = 0x67452301;
00269         context->Intermediate_Hash[1]   = 0xEFCDAB89;
00270         context->Intermediate_Hash[2]   = 0x98BADCFE;
00271         context->Intermediate_Hash[3]   = 0x10325476;
00272         context->Intermediate_Hash[4]   = 0xC3D2E1F0;
00273 
00274         context->Computed   = 0;
00275         context->Corrupted  = 0;
00276 
00277         return shaSuccess;
00278 }
00279 
00290 int SHA1::SHA1Input(    SHA1_CTX    *context,
00291                         const hl_uint8  *message_array,
00292                         unsigned int   length)
00293 {
00294         if (!length)
00295         {
00296                 return shaSuccess;
00297         }
00298 
00299         if (!context || !message_array)
00300         {
00301                 return shaNull;
00302         }
00303 
00304         if (context->Computed)
00305         {
00306                 context->Corrupted = shaStateError;
00307                 return shaStateError;
00308         }
00309 
00310         if (context->Corrupted)
00311         {
00312                 return context->Corrupted;
00313         }
00314         while(length-- && !context->Corrupted)
00315         {
00316                 context->Message_Block[context->Message_Block_Index++] =
00317                         (*message_array & 0xFF);
00318 
00319                 context->Length_Low += 8;
00320                 if (context->Length_Low == 0)
00321                 {
00322                         context->Length_High++;
00323                         if (context->Length_High == 0)
00324                         {
00325                                 /* Message is too long */
00326                                 context->Corrupted = 1;
00327                         }
00328                 }
00329 
00330                 if (context->Message_Block_Index == 64)
00331                 {
00332                         SHA1ProcessMessageBlock(context);
00333                 }
00334 
00335                 message_array++;
00336         }
00337 
00338         return shaSuccess;
00339 }
00340 
00350 int SHA1::SHA1Result( SHA1_CTX *context,
00351                       hl_uint8    Message_Digest[SHA1HashSize])
00352 {
00353         int i;
00354 
00355         if (!context || !Message_Digest)
00356         {
00357                 return shaNull;
00358         }
00359 
00360         if (context->Corrupted)
00361         {
00362                 return context->Corrupted;
00363         }
00364 
00365         if (!context->Computed)
00366         {
00367                 SHA1PadMessage(context);
00368                 for(i=0; i<64; ++i)
00369                 {
00370                         /* message may be sensitive, clear it out */
00371                         context->Message_Block[i] = 0;
00372                 }
00373                 context->Length_Low = 0;    /* and clear length */
00374                 context->Length_High = 0;
00375                 context->Computed = 1;
00376         }
00377 
00378         for(i = 0; i < SHA1HashSize; ++i)
00379         {
00380                 Message_Digest[i] = context->Intermediate_Hash[i>>2]
00381                         >> 8 * ( 3 - ( i & 0x03 ) );
00382         }
00383 
00384         return shaSuccess;
00385 }
